title: Adhesive Bandage
description: An adhesive bandage used for first aid. Sometimes called a Band-Aid or band aid after the trademarked product. Sometimes called a plaster.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the adhesive bandage emoji appears as a clean, white strip with a soft, rounded corner and a gentle, subtle curve, reflecting Apple's meticulous design for clarity and ease of recognition. Realistic lighting highlights its slightly raised texture, suggesting a comforting and healing presence. This emoji is commonly employed to indicate injury, recovery, or offering support and care.
